methods.name: getSectionIndex
methods.comment:
The sectionIndex field (2 bytes) designates the 
 section number to which this relocation header refers.

return.comment: section number to which this relocation header refers

methods.javadoc:
Reserved, must be set to zero (0).
@return reserved, must be set to zero (0)
methods.name: getReservedA
methods.comment: Reserved, must be set to zero (0).

return.comment: reserved, must be set to zero (0)

methods.name: getRelocCount
methods.comment:
The relocCount field (4 bytes) indicates the 
 number of 16-bit relocation blocks for this section.

return.comment: number of 16-bit relocation blocks for this section

methods.javadoc:
The firstRelocOffset field (4 bytes) indicates the byte 
 offset from the start of the relocations area to the first relocation 
 instruction for this section.
@return offset from the start of the relocations area to the first relocation
methods.name: getFirstRelocOffset
methods.comment:
The firstRelocOffset field (4 bytes) indicates the byte 
 offset from the start of the relocations area to the first relocation 
 instruction for this section.

return.comment: offset from the start of the relocations area to the first relocation

name: LoaderRelocationHeader
